channel.title: CVE Feed for FunnelKit -- SlingBlocks – Gutenberg Blocks by FunnelKit (Formerly WooFunnels)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for FunnelKit -- SlingBlocks – Gutenberg Blocks by FunnelKit (Formerly WooFunnels)

item.title: CVE-2024-38684|2024-07-20T07:42:30.007Z -- funnelkit -- slingblocks%20%E2%80%93%20gutenberg%20blocks%20by%20funnelkit%20%28formerly%20woofunnels%29
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in FunnelKit SlingBlocks – Gutenberg Blocks by FunnelKit (Formerly WooFunnels) allows Stored XSS.This issue affects SlingBlocks – Gutenberg Blocks by FunnelKit (Formerly WooFunnels): from n/a through 1.4.1.
